CustomField.inlineHelpText: The total amount of the medication contained in the dosage. If the dosage is a ratio, specify the numerator value. If the dosage is a range, specify the lower dosage value. If the dosage is a simple dose, specify the quantity. Examples: If quantity is 10 units/ml, then enter 10 in this field and 1 in Dosage Denominator. If quantity is 1-2 pills/day, then enter 1 in this field and 2 in Dosage Denominator.
